ygData.subject: RE: [EQ_Tinkering] Digest Number 244
ygData.msgSnippet: Wahoooo!  I probably /feedback on the gnome guard killing frenzy 10+ times since it began last fall.  I was so pissed each time I visited my homeland to see
ygData.messageBody:
Wahoooo! I probably /feedback on the gnome guard killing frenzy 10+
times since it began last fall. I was so pissed each time I visited
my homeland to see newbies running for life due to no guards to save
them. Plus the RP factor; halflings and woodelfs killing gnomes just
isn't right in RP. =) I'm sure, tho, that some newbies made tons of
cash from their dead brothern...which is the silver lining. But I
sure hope it's true that at least they did something to help our
Gnome Guards.

Kilkin Cobblepot - 40th Gemchopper - Fen Ro

---- Original Message -----
From: <jbuckingham@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, March 07, 2000 3:14 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Digest Number 244


> From: jbuckingham@...
>
>

Snip....

Though on the plus side, a friend of mine told me they
> upped the resist rate on the gnome guards, so there's been less
guard
> killers around than normal :)
>
